00039 QoccHarnessWindow::QoccHarnessWindow()
00040 : myLastFolder(tr(""))
00041 {
00042         myVC  = new QoccViewerContext();
00043         myOCC = new QoccViewWidget(myVC->getContext(), this); //Note this has changed!
00044         this->setCentralWidget(myOCC);
00045 
00046         createActions();
00047         createMenus();
00048 
00049         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("A context menu is available by right-clicking"));
00050 
00051         setWindowTitle(tr("Cam-occ v2"));
00052         setMinimumSize(160, 160);
00053         showMaximized();
00054 
00055         lnk mylink(this);
00056 
00057 }
00058 
00059 /*      Log window howto
00060 
00061 http://lists.trolltech.com/qt-interest/2004-03/thread00407-0.html
00062 
00063 Assuming you are developing for Unix, you can use standard Unix file
00064 descriptor tricks to make this happen. The basic idea is that you use
00065 the pipe(), dup(), and dup2() functions to replace stdout and stderr.
00066 Check their man pages (in section 2 of the manual) for more info. A
00067 simple example:
00068 
00069 #include <assert.h>
00070 #include <unistd.h>
00071 
00072 static int oldstdout;
00073 static int oldstderr;
00074 static int outpipe[2];
00075 static int errpipe[2];
00076 
00077 void funWithRedirection() {
00078         int result;
00079 
00080         result = oldstdout = dup(1);
00081         assert(result!=-1);
00082         result = oldstderr = dup(2);
00083         assert(result!=-1);
00084         result = pipe(outpipe);
00085         assert(result==0);
00086         result = pipe(errpipe);
00087         assert(result==0);
00088         result = dup2(outpipe[1], 1);
00089         assert(result!=-1);
00090         result = dup2(errpipe[1], 2);
00091         assert(result!=-1);
00092 }
00093 
00094 int getOrigOut() { return oldstderr; }
00095 int getOrigErr() { return oldstderr; }
00096 int getOutPipe() { return errpipe[0]; }
00097 int getErrPipe() { return errpipe[0]; }
00098 
00099 Now you use getOutPipe() and getErrPipe() to read from what was written
00100 to the pipes. You can wrap a QSocket object around each file descriptor
00101 and it will produce a readyRead() signal when data is available so you
00102 can copy it into your text area. Note that this may work better if you
00103 use socketpair() in place of pipe().
00104 
00105 **********************************************************************
00106 
00107 Using QPlainTextEdit as a Display Widget
00108 
00109 The text is set or replaced using setPlainText() which deletes any existing text and replaces it with the text passed in the setPlainText() call.
00110 
00111 Text itself can be inserted using the QTextCursor class or using the convenience functins insertPlainText(), appendPlainText() or paste().
00112 
00113 By default the text edit wraps words at whitespace to fit within the text edit widget. The setLineWrapMode() function is used to specify the kind of line wrap you want, WidgetWidth or NoWrap if you don't want any wrapping. If you use word wrap to the widget's width WidgetWidth, you can specify whether to break on whitespace or anywhere with setWordWrapMode().
00114 
00115 The find() function can be used to find and select a given string within the text.
00116 
00117 If you want to limit the total number of paragraphs in a QPlainTextEdit, as it is for example useful in a log viewer, then you can use the maximumBlockCount property. The combination of setMaximumBlockCount() and appendPlainText() turns QPlainTextEdit into an efficient viewer for log text. The scrolling can be reduced with the centerOnScroll() property, making the log viewer even faster. Text can be formatted in a limited way, either using a syntax highlighter (see below), or by appending html-formatted text with appendHtml(). While QPlainTextEdit does not support complex rich text rendering with tables and floats, it does support limited paragraph-based formatting that you may need in a log viewer.
00118 
00119 */
00120 
00121 void QoccHarnessWindow::newFile()
00122 {
00123     statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Invoked File|New"));
00124         //myOCC->getView()->ColorScaleErase();
00125         myVC->deleteAllObjects();
00126 }

00128 void QoccHarnessWindow::open()
00129 {
00130         QString         fileName;
00131         QString         fileType;
00132         QFileInfo       fileInfo;
00133 
00134         QoccInputOutput::FileFormat format;
00135         QoccInputOutput reader;
00136 
00137         statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Invoked File|Open"));
00138 
00139         myVC->getContext()->CloseAllContexts();         //mark 1-29-09 - prevent wireframe display (should be shaded) if a local context is open
00140 
00141         fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName (this,
00142                                                 tr("Open File"),
00143                                                 myLastFolder,
00144                                                 tr( "All drawing types (*.brep *.rle *.igs *iges *.stp *.step);;"
00145                                                         "BREP (*.brep *.rle);;"
00146                                                         "STEP (*.step *.stp);;"
00147                                                         "IGES (*.iges *.igs)" ) );
00148         if (!fileName.isEmpty())
00149         {
00150                 fileInfo.setFile(fileName);
00151                 fileType = fileInfo.suffix();
00152                 if (fileType.toLower() == tr("brep") || fileType.toLower() == tr("rle"))
00153                 {
00154                         format = QoccInputOutput::FormatBREP;
00155                 }
00156                 if (fileType.toLower() == tr("step") || fileType.toLower() == tr("stp"))
00157                 {
00158                         format = QoccInputOutput::FormatSTEP;
00159                 }
00160                 if (fileType.toLower() == tr("iges") || fileType.toLower() == tr("igs"))
00161                 {
00162                         format = QoccInputOutput::FormatIGES;
00163                 }
00164                 myLastFolder = fileInfo.absolutePath();
00165                 reader.importModel ( fileInfo.absoluteFilePath(), format, myOCC->getContext() );
00166         }
00167 
00168         myOCC->fitAll();
00169 
00170 }

00211             tr("<b>cam-occ2</b> is an opensource CAM program. It is very much a work in progress!<br>cam-occ2 (C) 2010 Mark Pictor<p>It uses an early version of <i>Qt OpenCASCADE</i>, a simple Qt4/OpenCASCADE Viewer.<br>QtOCC (C) 2006-7 Peter Dolbey."));

00219 void QoccHarnessWindow::bottle()
00220 {
00221     statusBar()->showMessage(tr("Invoked File|Load Bottle"));
00222         QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
00223         myVC->deleteAllObjects ();
00224         // Call the "bottle factory" to load and display the shape
00225         LoadBottle (myVC->getContext());
00226         // Force redraw
00227         myOCC->getView()->Redraw();
00228         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00229 }

00231 void QoccHarnessWindow::xyzPosition (V3d_Coordinate X,
00232                                                           V3d_Coordinate Y,
00233                                                           V3d_Coordinate Z)
00234 {
00235         QString aString;
00236         QTextStream ts(&aString);
00237         ts << X << "," << Y << "," << Z;
00238         statusBar()->showMessage(aString);
00239 }

00242                                                    V3d_Coordinate Y,
00243                                                    V3d_Coordinate Z)

00245         AddVertex ( X, Y, Z, myVC->getContext() );
00246 }

00256     newAction = new QAction(tr("&New"), this);
00257     newAction->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+N"));
00258     newAction->setStatusTip(tr("Create a new file"));
00259     connect(newAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(newFile()));
00260

00274     connect(printAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(print()));

00278     exitAction->setStatusTip(tr("Exit the application"));
00279     connect(exitAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(close()));

00437 void QoccHarnessWindow::createMenus()
00438 {
00439     fileMenu = menuBar()->addMenu( tr("&File") );
00440                 fileMenu->addAction( newAction );
00441                 fileMenu->addAction( openAction );
00442                 fileMenu->addAction( saveAction );
00443                 fileMenu->addAction( printAction );
00444 /*
00445                 Comment out the 2 lines below to hide the
00446                 Load Bottle menu option - still left in for
00447                 now as a demo feature.
00448 */
00449                 fileMenu->addSeparator();
00450                 fileMenu->addAction( bottleAction );
00451 
00452                 fileMenu->addSeparator();
00453                 fileMenu->addAction( exitAction );
00454 
00455     editMenu = menuBar()->addMenu( tr("&Edit") );
00456                 editMenu->addAction( undoAction );
00457                 editMenu->addAction( redoAction );
00458                 editMenu->addSeparator();
00459                 editMenu->addAction( cutAction );
00460                 editMenu->addAction( copyAction );
00461                 editMenu->addAction( pasteAction );
00462 
00463         viewMenu = menuBar()->addMenu( tr("&View") );
00464                 viewDisplayMenu = viewMenu->addMenu( tr("&Display") );
00465                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewFrontAction );
00466                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewBackAction );
00467                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewTopAction );
00468                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewBottomAction );
00469                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewLeftAction );
00470                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewRightAction );
00471                         viewDisplayMenu->addSeparator();
00472                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewAxoAction );
00473                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewGridAction );
00474                         viewDisplayMenu->addSeparator();
00475                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( viewResetAction );
00476                         viewDisplayMenu->addSeparator();
00477                         viewDisplayMenu->addAction( backgroundAction );
00478 
00479                 viewActionsMenu = viewMenu->addMenu( tr("&Actions") );
00480                         viewActionsMenu->addAction( fitAction );
00481                         viewActionsMenu->addAction( fitAllAction );
00482                         viewActionsMenu->addAction( zoomAction );
00483                         viewActionsMenu->addAction( panAction );
00484                         viewActionsMenu->addAction( rotAction );
00485 
00486                 gridMenu = viewMenu->addMenu( tr("&Grid") );
00487                         gridMenu->addAction( gridOnAction );
00488                         gridMenu->addAction( gridOffAction );
00489                         gridMenu->addSeparator();
00490                         gridMenu->addAction( gridXYAction );
00491                         gridMenu->addAction( gridXZAction );
00492                         gridMenu->addAction( gridYZAction );
00493                         gridMenu->addSeparator();
00494                         gridMenu->addAction( gridRectAction );
00495                         gridMenu->addAction( gridCircAction );
00496     helpMenu = new QMenu(tr("&Help"));
00497     helpAction = menuBar()->addMenu(helpMenu);
00498     helpMenu->addAction(aboutAction);
00499     helpMenu->addAction(aboutQtAction);
00500 }
